question:
Your Next Door neighbor often listens to loud music late at night. Because of the loud music , you often have problems sleeping.


Write a letter to the authority of the building.
 In your letter


Describe the situationExplain the problems it is causing you.Propose a solution to the problem
text: I am writing this letter to complain about the problems which I am currently facing because of my neighbour.

I work at "XYZ Company" and I have to take care of all the operational activities of the firm, which requires a lot of effort, concentration and time and due to the burden of the work I have to sit for long hours and I often get back home at 10 p.m. My Neighbour, Mr Ahmed, is fond of music and he loves to listen to music at late hours. Besides that, he has a strong stereo system along with woofers which cause a high-base loud noise in the apartment.

Since I get too tired after my office hours so, I usually go to bed early and need to take a sound sleep but this awful situation does not allow me to stay in peace. Furthermore, I am a cardiac patient and cannot bear huge noise, therefore my condition often gets worst at the night.
You are requested to issue him an advisory notice on behalf of the building authority and instruct him to avoid such activities in future.
I look forward to hearing from you soon.
